CustomField.description: Sort the values for Nurse When
CustomField.formula: Case ( VCC_Logistical_Recommendation_WHEN__c, "Now, 911", "1.Now 911", "911", "1.911", "Now", "2.Now", "Within 8 Hours", "3.Within 8 Hours", "Within 24 Hours", "4.Within 24 Hours", "Within 3 Days", "5.Within 3 Days", "Within 2 Weeks", "6.Within 2 Weeks", "Selfcare", "7.Selfcare", "8." )
CustomField.label: Nurse When Sort
